TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior
type AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IServiceBehavior

summary.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用于服务实现类时，此属性可指示该服务是否需要 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式，或是否支持为宿主应用程序域 (AppDomain) 启用该兼容模式。When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). 承载 WCF 服务的应用程序域可以在两个不同的宿主模式下运行：AppDomains hosting WCF services can run in two different hosting modes: - 混合传输模式 （默认值）： 在此模式下，WCF 服务不参与[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管道。Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, WCF services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. 这可保证 WCF 服务行为的一致性，独立于宿主环境和传输。This guarantees that a WCF service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性模式： 在此模式下，WCF 服务参与[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管道的方式与 ASMX 服务类似。 Compatibility Mode: In this mode, WCF services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 文件授权、 url 授权和 HTTP 会话状态等功能都适用于在此模式下运行的 WCF 服务。 features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to WCF services running in this mode. 宿主模式由应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 控制。The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` 此标志是`false`默认情况下和因此 WCF 服务运行在混合传输模式下除非你显式选择加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]兼容性模式。This flag is `false` by default and thus WCF services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. 有关 ASP.NET 兼容模式的详细信息，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more informaiton about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 使用 属性可以实现此目的。Use the property to do this. 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples 服务开发人员可以确保其服务仅运行在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下通过设置属性到下面的示例中所示Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: ，该值指示服务所需的度 [！INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性。

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以在代码中设置宿主模式。Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. 还可以通过设置应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 来完成此操作。This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

exception.span: The value is not a valid one for the .
